title: AI Administrative Assistant
subtitle: Automate scheduling, email management, and administrative tasks to reclaim your time
description: Deploy an AI administrative assistant that manages calendars, triages emails, schedules meetings, handles travel arrangements, and coordinates tasks—freeing executives and teams from routine admin work.

benefits.title: Intelligent Calendar Management
benefits.description: AI coordinates schedules across teams, finds optimal meeting times, handles rescheduling requests, and blocks focus time based on work patterns.

benefits.title: Email Triage & Responses
benefits.description: Automatically classify emails by priority, draft responses to common requests, flag urgent items, and archive or file messages into folders.

benefits.title: Meeting Coordination
benefits.description: Schedule internal meetings, book conference rooms, send calendar invites, prepare agendas, and distribute pre-read materials automatically.

benefits.title: Travel & Logistics
benefits.description: Research flight options, book accommodations within budget, create detailed itineraries, and handle changes or cancellations on your behalf.

features.title: Smart Scheduling
features.description: AI learns scheduling preferences (no meetings before 10am, 30-min buffer between calls) and books appointments that respect these rules.

features.title: Email Inbox Management
features.description: Sort incoming emails into categories, unsubscribe from unwanted lists, summarize long threads, and draft replies to routine inquiries.

features.title: Meeting Preparation
features.description: Pull relevant files, past meeting notes, and stakeholder context—then compile into pre-meeting briefs delivered an hour before each call.

features.title: Travel Booking
features.description: Search flights, hotels, and car rentals based on your preferences and budget—presenting top 3 options for quick approval before booking.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Track to-do items, send reminders for deadlines, follow up on pending requests, and update project management tools with task status.

features.title: Document Organization
features.description: File emails and attachments into proper folders, rename files with clear naming conventions, and maintain organized shared drives.

useCases.title: Executive Support
useCases.description: Manage C-level calendars with 30+ meetings per week: coordinate across time zones, prepare briefing docs, handle last-minute changes, and ensure no conflicts.

useCases.title: Sales Team Admin
useCases.description: Book demo calls for AEs, send calendar invites to prospects, prepare account research briefs, and follow up with no-shows to reschedule automatically.

useCases.title: Event Coordination
useCases.description: Manage company all-hands or team offsites: send save-the-dates, collect RSVPs, book venues, coordinate catering, and distribute agendas.

metrics.efficiency: Reclaim 15+ hours per week from admin tasks
